titleStmt.title: A letter from the Lord General, dated the one and twentieth day of July, to the Right Honorable William Lenthal Esq; speaker of the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. Shewing the great mercies of almighty God in the late success given to the Parliaments forces in Scotland, against the enemy there. Friday, the 25 of July. 1651. Ordered by the Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
